# Government Tender Announcement
## Solicitation Number: WS4030169771

### Request for Proposal

* **Solicitation Title**: RCMP Musical Ride - Supply of Hay
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity**: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)

### Tender Details
* **Closing Date and Time**: September 11th, 2023, at 14:00 EST.
* **Location:** Ottawa, Canada
* **Supply Requirements**:
	+ First quality square hay bales for horses in small and large sizes
	+ Quantity: 390 metric tons per year
	+ Delivery method: Contractor will deliver and unload the feed on an as-and-when-requested basis
* **Transportation and Unloading**:
	+ Contractor must use their own equipment for transporting and unloading the feed
	+ Delivery must be made within 72 hours from receipt of the Order Request form

### Evaluation Criteria
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Contact Information
* **Procurement Authority**: Rémi Simard (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email Address**: remi.simard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: Not specified

### Notice and Attachments
* **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17159281?extsite=MTcxNTkyODFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **No attachment is available for this tender.**
